dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: observationSynonym
dataModel.author: R. Peet

entity.entitySummary: This table stores opinions as to whether one observation record is a synonym of another owing to double entry into the database.

attribute.attNotes: Primary Key for the observationSynonym table.
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique interpretaiton of an observation as a synonym.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the observation table
attribute.attDefinition: Link to the observation table identifying which observation is being reduced to synonymy.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the observation table
attribute.attDefinition: Link to the observation table identifying which observation is the prefered synonym for the observation being reduced to synonym.

attribute.attNotes: This is the foreign key into the party table.
attribute.attDefinition: Foreign key pointing to the specific party that made the reduction to synonym.

attribute.attNotes: This is the foreign key into the aux_Role table
attribute.attDefinition: Foreign key that identifies the role that the party had in the plot synonomization (e.g., plot author, data manager, publication author, researcher, generic user, etc.).
Start date for the synonymization event.
Stop date for the synonymization event.
Notes about the reason for the synonymization.
